titleStmt.title: The pouring fourth of the seventh and last viall upon all flesh and fleshlines, which will be a terror to the men that have great possessions, or, Several visions which hath bin made out to me of what the all of all things is now bringing to pass ... George Foster, or otherwise Jacob Israel.
titleStmt.author: Foster, George.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
